name: Laura Llanos
text: Drove six miles to get the Pretzel Crust Pizza because I loved it back in NYC, when it was last out, four years ago. Bought two. Got them home and was quite disappointed to find it was regular pizza crust with the Pretzel Crust toppings. Not cool.

name: Duane Brinson
text: Food is good. Great customer service. The cashier was honest with me about one of the hot n ready being out too long and made me a fresh pizza on the spot.

name: tim mcdaniel
text: What can I say about Little Caesars there is a reason they've been a business so long they're cheap delicious they have the most bacon e Pizza on the face of the Earth and I don't know if they do it on purpose but all their pizzas are ‚Ä¶More

name: mysti rito
text: The customer service was very bad tonight. My cashier willie S. was on his cell phone talking to someone else while helping me. when he got the pizza out he threw it on the counter and didn't even say have a nice night. pizza is always good though.

name: Christopher Crouch
text: My order was simple and completed quickly. However, I'm finding some locations of Little Caesars seem to be skimping on the cheese when ordering an "extramost". This location is one I'll be avoiding for that reason alone. I hate having to order extra cheese for a product that advertises such but doesn't deliver.

name: Kyle Magrill
text: Always relied on this place for a quick pizza in a hurry.  Sadly, went there on June 4th and it is closed with a sign on the door saying: "Please visit our other locations...".  The sign from the building's outside has been removed and was sitting on the floor inside.  Bye Little Ceasar's.  R.I.P.

name: Killerrogue32 Churned slinger
text: The place said there was no pizza only cheesey bread. What kind of pizza place doesn't have pizza.

name: Beth Osteen
text: I ordered 60$ worth of food today and when i got home to eat it with my family the one pizza was well over cooked and my other one was still dough inside. Very disappointed

name: Try Me
text: This is the best location ever! April 3, 2019 they fixed my issues from another store in which me and my partber were dealt with a manager or GM and she was VERY RUDE! But 43rd fixed everything and this is now my location.

name: Luis Rodriguez
text: I wish  that there  Employees  use some kind of a hat or hair net. It turned me off when I see a person slinging their hair around the  food they are.. preparing.

name: David Indarawis
text: 4 out of 5 times the ‚ÄúHot-N-Ready‚Äôs‚Äù are never hot and ready. So, I started calling in about 15 to 20 minutes before arriving, and still‚Ä¶when I get there it is not ready and you have to wait. Could easily be remedied with good management, ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt sides
text: Everything I ordered was ready on time but the extra most bestest pepperoni I ordered came out looking like amateur night....

name: Jane Burnette
text: Fast and delicious. Wish they'd bring back the pretzel crust option.

name: JDM M
text: Their new deep dish pizza is good. They have pretty good specials too. Most of the time the pizza is ready to go and that's a huge plus while just wanting to rush home

name: Oleksandr Moskalenko
text: Poorly run location, almost every order gets mixed up or even forgotten. Pizza is good when they manage to finally make it.

name: Kwllilmonster BlahblahBlah

text: Fresh $6 pizza everytime we go. So great for parties.

text: They had literally one pizza available and no crazy bread. Hardly ‚Äúhot and ready‚Äù. Just go to a real pizza place.

text: Pizza was HOT and READY just like the sign promised! Workers were nice, and the pizza was as good as a $5 box of pizza is gonna get.
